Thanks!

Karla takes in as deep a breath as he can through the mask once the vibrator is removed. With how long he’s been subjected to the buzzing in such a short period of time, his hole feels numb and welcomes the change from vibrator to cock.

It’s horrifying to him that he’s already thankful to them for such a thing, but given the circumstances he’s fairly certain that he deserves some slack while he’s fucked on all fours.

Within minutes, he cums, giving Karla a few rough smacks on the ass just because he can.

"Let's get some shuteye for now," he pants. "I can't wait to take Pinefield out on his little walk tomorrow."

"Same, buddy," the other says, yanking Karla back towards his cage in Danny's room. "This little slut will need some rest too."

He removes the mask once he gets him back in the cage, lying him down on his back as he and his friends leave him alone for the remainder of the night.

The cage is too small for Karla to maneuver himself and turn himself over into a more comfortable position. Instead he just has to live with leaking cum from his ass and resting in what has to be the most vulnerable position he’s ever been in for the rest of the night.

He thinks about the walk for far longer than he should, working himself up into a panic for how it’s going to go.

And for as long as he wants to stay on guard he’s just too exhausted to keep his eyes open for very long.

When morning comes, the three bullies are more than excited for the walk. All three of them slept well, even though their pet likely didn't.

Danny rattles the cage before opening the door, tugging out Karla's body and placing him on his knees and elbows.

"Morning, Pinefield," he greets, tugging him towards the dining room where his friends are eating. "Are you excited for the walk today?"

The two dog bowls are on the floor next to the table, one filled with water, the other with instant ramen. 

"Eat up, it's going to be a long day."

Karla sighs as he’s lead into the dining room, paying the other two bullies no mind as he sets sight on his own meal. It’s demeaning but he’s already drank water from the bowl once and after last night’s events he’s practically starving.

No doubt they would take extreme joy in how messy eating the ramen would be without the use of utensils or even his hands, Karla can’t bring himself to care as he digs his face into the bowl and starts to eat his breakfast.

The three snicker as Karla digs in, one recording it on his phone until the ramen is gone.

"Tastes good, huh? If you're good for us on the walk, we might get you a special treat..." Danny says as he forces a pair of boxers in his mouth, using tape to seal it shut.

"On goes the mask again, bitch," he announces before forcing the tight rubbery mask on his face, tugging the collar towards the front door. The three plan to drive him over to the next town over, but not without seeing him wobble out the door for their entertainment.
(( what do you feel about Danny and his friends taking Karla to a building during the walk where he's used as a toy, where his captors earn money while he takes the abuse?

Karla flushes with embarrassment, doing his best to ignore the three while he finishes up. Licking his lips, he doesn’t protest to being gagged again - though he does whine when the mask is once again placed over his head and tucked under the collar and it’s jingling tag.

Once more, he begins the slow hobbling crawl the suit forces him to make in order to get anyway. He loathes to admit that the action becomes easier with each time he’s forced to move about in the damned thing.
Oh what do you think about the bitchsuit being white with Dalmatian spots?

Oh that sounds good! Get some hypnosis up in there.

When Karla reaches the door, the three bullies pick him up and put him in the back seat of the car, resting him on his legs as if he's sitting. During the car ride, two of them sit in the back with Karla, playing with his nipples and rubbing at the bulge trapped in the suit.

Once Danny reaches their destination, the bullies place Karla on his elbows and knees again, tugging on the collar after he's placed on the sidewalk. Already a few people are eyeing him as they tug him towards the park, but they don't seem to be too shocked.
